layout.name: type
layout.title: Type
layout.tooltip: Which subvariation should it use? Check the behavior section in the NPC's tooltip for more info.

layout.name: whitelist
layout.title: White List
layout.tooltip:
The spyblock will only scan for objects with matching ID. You can multiple IDs by seperating them by commas, ex 1, 2, 3
If left blank, then all objects IDs will be scanned. Note, for player spyblocks, it will filter characters instead of IDs.
